snippet: Social divisions threaten to tear a fragile democracy apart.
abstract: Op-Ed article by foreign policy scholars Seyom Brown and Vanda Felbab-Brown warns that Nepal is at risk of becoming a failed state; urges the international community to pressure Nepalese leaders to put stability and justice ahead of power and profit by withholding foreign aid.

byline.original: By SEYOM BROWN and VANDA FELBAB-BROWN

lead_paragraph: Social divisions threaten to tear a fragile democracy apart.

headline.main: Nepal, on the Brink of Collapse
headline.print_headline: Nepal, on the Brink of Collapse
